metadata.title: USN-7234-3 -- Linux kernel (Azure) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Ye Zhang and Nicolas Wu discovered that the io_uring subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle locking for rings with IOPOLL, leading to a double-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-21400)  Several security issues were discovered in the Linux kernel. An attacker could possibly use these to compromise the system. This update corrects flaws in the following subsystems:   - TTY drivers;   - Netfilter;   - Network traffic control;   - VMware vSockets driver; (CVE-2024-53141, CVE-2024-53103, CVE-2024-40967, CVE-2024-53164)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7234-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-azure-5.4-cloud-tools-5.4.0-1143 - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-azure-5.4-headers-5.4.0-1143 - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-azure-5.4-tools-5.4.0-1143 - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-buildinfo-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-headers-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-image-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-modules-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 linux-tools-5.4.0-1143-azure - 5.4.0-1143.150~18.04.1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro  linux-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-cloud-tools-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-headers-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-headers-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-image-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-image-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-modules-extra-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-signed-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-signed-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-signed-image-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-signed-image-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-tools-azure - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 linux-tools-azure-edge - 5.4.0.1143.150~18.04.1 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
